attributes.comment: Conflating gender and sex is not best practice in medicine. I believe it is a woman's right to know the sex of her health care provider, as there is much touch in the medical arena. I think its dangerous to create this space where men can identify as women and be a medical provider, especially in gynecology and obstetrics. I urge you bot to change any of this language. Women have been fighting for sex based rights for a long time. We need protection under the law.
